Metadata: Pharmacological characterizatio​n of the pseudopterosins​: novel anti-​inflammatory natural products isolated from the Caribbean soft coral, "Pseudopterogor​gia elisabethae."

The purpose of this study was to characterize the pharmacological effects of two bioactive diterpenoid glycosides isolated from the sea whip "Pseudopterogor​gia elisabethae", pseudopterosin A and pseudopterosin E. Results suggest that the mechanism of "in vivo" analgesic and anti-​inflammatory activity of the pseudopterosins results as a consequence of "in vivo" inhibition of eicosanoid release.
